data.trans_hint: Mọi người cảm thấy khó từ bỏ những thực phẩm ưa thích quen thuộc của họ và thử một cái gì đó mới.
data.en_hint: People find it hard to relinquish their accustomed food preferences and try something new.
data.content_game_1: People find it hard to relinquish their accustomed food preferences and try something new.
data.answer_en_hint: People find it hard to relinquish their accustomed food preferences and try something new.

data.trans: Phá hủy hoàn toàn, đánh bại hoàn toàn
data.trans_hint: Mục tiêu của ảnh ấy là phá hủy cả tòa nhà.
data.en_hint: His goal is to annihilate the whole building.
data.content_game_1: His goal is to annihilate the whole building.
data.answer_en_hint: His goal is to annihilate the whole building.

data.trans_hint: Một khi gián xâm nhập vào tòa nhà thì rất khó để tiêu diệt chúng.
data.en_hint: Once cockroaches get into a building, it's very difficult to exterminate them.
data.content_game_1: Once cockroaches get into a building, it's very difficult to exterminate them.
data.answer_en_hint: Once cockroaches get into a building, it's very difficult to exterminate them.

data.trans: Sự coi khinh, sự coi thường, sự khinh rẻ
data.trans_hint: Ông ta tỏ rõ sự coi thường các học trò của mình.
data.en_hint: He showed an obvious contempt for his fellow students.
data.content_game_1: He showed an obvious contempt for his fellow students.
data.answer_en_hint: He showed an obvious contempt for his fellow students.

data.trans: Hoãn, trì hoãn, làm chậm lại
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta có thể hoãn chuyến đi cho đến ngày mai.
data.en_hint: We can defer our departure until tomorrow.
data.content_game_1: We can defer our departure until tomorrow.
data.answer_en_hint: We can defer our departure until tomorrow.

data.trans: Từ chức, từ bỏ (công việc, tổ chức,...)
data.trans_hint: Cả hai ông đều phủ nhận mọi hành vi sai trái nhưng vẫn từ chức.
data.en_hint: Both men denied any wrongdoing but still resigned from their posts.
data.content_game_1: Both men denied any wrongdoing but still resigned from their posts.
data.answer_en_hint: Both men denied any wrongdoing but still resigned from their posts.

data.trans: Sự hạn chế, sự gò bó
data.trans_hint: Các quyết định được đưa ra trong sự giới hạn về tài chính của ngân sách.
data.en_hint: Decisions are made within the financial restraints of the budget.
data.content_game_1: Decisions are made within the financial restraints of the budget.
data.answer_en_hint: Decisions are made within the financial restraints of the budget.

data.trans: Nỗ lực, cực kỳ cố gắng cho cái gì
data.trans_hint: Họ luôn cố gắng hướng tới sự hoàn hảo.
data.en_hint: They were always striving towards perfection.
data.content_game_1: They were always striving towards perfection.
data.answer_en_hint: They were always striving towards perfection.

data.trans_hint: Bọn khủng bố được cho 10 phút để đầu hàng.
data.en_hint: The terroist were given 10 minutes to surrender.
data.content_game_1: The terroist were given 10 minutes to surrender.
data.answer_en_hint: The terroist were given 10 minutes to surrender.

data.trans_hint: Niềm hy vọng của họ dần héo mòn.
data.content_game_1: Their hopes gradually withered away.
data.answer_en_hint: Their hopes gradually withered away.
